tool.name: folders
tool.command:
parsec folders set_permissions --folder_id "$folder_id"
#if $action --action "$action" #end if #if $add_ids --add_ids "$add_ids" #end if #if $manage_ids --manage_ids "$manage_ids" #end if #if $modify_ids --modify_ids "$modify_ids" #end if
| jq -S . > $results

input.name: folder_id
input.label: folder_id
input.help: the folder's encoded id, prefixed by 'F'

input.name: add_ids
input.help: list of role IDs which can add datasets to the folder

input.name: manage_ids
input.help: list of role IDs which can manage datasets in the folder

input.name: modify_ids
input.help: list of role IDs which can modify datasets in the folder

tool.help: Set the permissions of a folder.
